head.title: Home - Crystal City 47

a.title: Go to Crystal City Elementary School
Go to Crystal City High School

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

a.title: Standard Complaint Resolution Procedure for NCLB
a.span: Standard Complaint Resolution Procedure for NCLB

li.a: Standard Complaint Resolution Procedure for NCLB

span.span: Welcome to Crystal City 47 School District! Our mission is to recognize the potential within students and prepare them intellectually, physically, and socially to be productive and contributing members of society.

span.style: white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

div.style: font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); white-space: pre-wrap;
position: relative; direction: ltr; font-family: inherit;

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

p.span: The school board and I are excited to announce that our new Superintendent is Matt Holdinghausen. Most of you know

span.style: background-color: transparent; letter-spacing: 0.07px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

p.span: Mr. Holdinghausen is currently our high school principal and will be taking over as superintendent effective July 1, 2020.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

p.span: Letter from Mr. Holdinghausen is attached HERE

div.span: Until further notice, any Open Session Board meetings will be closed to the public but open for viewing on Facebook Live on our district Facebook page. More information will follow.

br.span: School will be closing on March 17 Tuesday at 5:00 due to Corona virus safety and will be anticipated start date of April 23. More information is on the link to the right.

span.style: font-size: small; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

em.style: background-color: transparent; letter-spacing: 0.07px; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; font-size: small;
em.span: Crystal City Schools are always looking for qualified substitute teachers. If you are looking for part time work and like working with kids fill out the application under 'employment opportunities' so we can get you on the list.

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-size: 14px; letter-spacing: 0.07px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

br.a: Corona Virus letter to community and school closing information

div.div: 1100 Mississippi Avenue, Crystal City, MO 63019 | Phone 636-937-4411 | Fax 636-937-2512
